issue.title: [CF 889] Wrong text on tooltip at Buff/Debuff Check icon
issue.body:
At a Buff/Debuff icon, at the tab "Show States & Opacity" when you hover at "Any Absent" the tooltip sais "...units being checked missing all of the...". So one of the 2 texts are wrong :)

Same goes for "All Present" that sais "...units being checked have at least one of those buffs/debuffs..."

I am using TMW v7.0.0 (r193)

mOOwalker


> Posted by CurseForge user mOOwalker | Imported from CurseForge issue #889 | Raw

comments.body:
What is the issue here? The tooltips describe when each state will be active. There is no error in their description.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Its a tooltip error as far as I see it.

"Any absent" does not mean "...units being checked missing ALL of the..." but "...ANY of the...". Same with "All Present" does not mean "...units being checked have AT LEAST one of those buffs/debuffs..." but "...units being checked have ALL one of those buffs/debuffs...". Again this is on Buff/Debuff Check Icon.

mOOwalker


> Posted by CurseForge user mOOwalker

Nevermind, I just realized that the Any absent is refereed to the UNIT being tracked and not at BUFF/DEBUFF.

mOOwalker


> Posted by CurseForge user mOOwalker
